tokenActionHud.title: Token Action HUD
tokenActionHud.dialog.resetActions.title: Reset Actions
tokenActionHud.dialog.resetActions.conte: This will reset all actions for this actor. Do you wish to continue?
tokenActionHud.dialog.resetLayout.title: Token Action HUD | Reset Layout
tokenActionHud.dialog.resetLayout.conten: This will reset your HUD to the default layout. Do you wish to continue?
tokenActionHud.dialog.resetAllLayouts.ti: Token Action HUD | Reset All Layouts
tokenActionHud.dialog.resetAllLayouts.co: This will reset every user's HUD to the default layout. Do you wish to continue?
tokenActionHud.form.hud.groupDetail: Click available items to select them, click and drag selected items to change their order and click the X on selected items to unselect them. Click an empty area of the Selected Items box and start typing to filter the available items.
tokenActionHud.form.hud.hudDetail: Click an empty area of the Selected Items box, type the name of the item then press Enter to add it. Click and drag items to change their order.
tokenActionHud.form.group.characterCount: Limit the characters per word of the actions

tokenActionHud.settings.allow.name: Allow HUD
tokenActionHud.settings.alwaysShowHud.hi: Show the user's assigned character even when no token is selected

tokenActionHud.settings.direction.name: Direction

tokenActionHud.settings.displayIcons.hin: Where available, choose whether to display icons on the actions
tokenActionHud.settings.drag.hint: Choose when the HUD can be moved by clicking and dragging one of the top-level buttons
tokenActionHud.settings.drag.name: Dragging
tokenActionHud.settings.enable.name: Enable HUD

tokenActionHud.settings.rollHandler.hint: GM setting: Set the module for the HUD to use for handling rolls

tokenActionHud.settings.style.hint: Set the style of the HUD
tokenActionHud.settings.style.name: Style
